name: FAT-stronaut
description:
Oxygen might be endless in the future, but you still have to eat! When you get stranded during a exploration mission, starvation becomes a major problem . Luckily, someone left the kitchen bay open on your ship, scattering your tasty snacks across the galaxy. The question is … CAN YOU EAT YOUR WAY THROUGH SPACE?!

*** Optimized for Desktop Downloadable Version.
